metadata.description: The name for the Virtual Machine
Name of the availability set. Leave empty if availability set is not needed
Choose YES if the Availability Set specified before must be created by the template; choose NO if the Availability Set already exists
DNS name of the AD domain you want to join. Leave empty if you don't want to join a domain during provisioning
Admin username for the Virtual Machine. If a domain is specified in the appropriate parameter, this user will be used both for local admin and to join domain
Admin password for the Virtual Machine
The vnet you want to connect to. Leave empty to create a new ad hoc virtual network
If using an existing vnet, specify the name of resource group which contains it. Otherwise, leave it empty
The subnet you want to connect to
The private IP address you want to assign to the NIC; leave DHCP to maintain a dynamic IP
Would you like to enable accelerated networking? It works only on supported VMs
Link a public IP address to the NIC?
If public IP address is enabled, choose a unique DNS Name to access the Virtual Machine.
The array of application security group ids you want to join. Leave empty to skip this step.

metadata.description: The SQL Server version you want to deploy
The size of the virtual machine
Would you like to active Azure Hybrid Benefits and use an existing Windows license on this VM?

allowedValues: (UTC-04:00) Georgetown, La Paz, Manaus, San Juan
(UTC+01:00) Amsterdam, Berlin, Bern, Rome, Stockholm, Vienna
(UTC+02:00) Helsinki, Kyiv, Riga, Sofia, Tallinn, Vilnius

metadata.description: Choose the time zone for the virtual machine
Suffix that will be used to compose OS disk name
Suffix that will be used to compose additional disk name
The type of storage to use for OS disk
The type of storage to use for Data Disks
The workload type which will be executed on this VM
The number of data disks to add to the virtual machine
The size of data disks to add to the virtual machine
Create a storage pool to stripe all the data disks?
The number of log disks to add to the virtual machine
The size of log disks to add to the virtual machine
Create a storage pool to stripe all the data disks?
The number of additional disks to add to the virtual machine
The size of additional disks to add to the virtual machine
The name of the storage account to use for diagnostic logs. If it doesn't exist, it will be created. Leave it empty to use a default value based on VM name.
Enable SQL IaaS Extension?

input.name: [concat(parameters('vmName'), '-', parameters('AdditionalDiskSuffix'), string(CopyIndex('dataDisks', 1)))]
input.diskSizeGB: [if(less(copyIndex('dataDisks'), parameters('#ofDataDisks')), parameters('DataDisksSize'), if(less(copyIndex('dataDisks'), add(parameters('#ofDataDisks'), parameters('#ofLogDisks'))), parameters('LogDisksSize'), parameters('additionalDisksSize')))]
input.caching: [if(less(copyIndex('dataDisks'), parameters('#ofDataDisks')), variables('DataDiskCacheSetting'), if(less(copyIndex('dataDisks'), add(parameters('#ofDataDisks'), parameters('#ofLogDisks'))), variables('LogDiskCacheSetting'), variables('AdditionalDiskCacheSetting')))]

variables.SqlIaaSCfgParameters: [concat('-NumberOfDataDisks ', parameters('#ofDataDisks'), if(equals(tolower(parameters('stripeDataDisks')), 'yes'), ' -StripeDataDisks', ''), ' -NumberOfLogDisks ', parameters('#ofLogDisks'), if(equals(tolower(parameters('stripeLogDisks')), 'yes'), ' -StripeLogDisks', ''), ' -NumberOfAdditionalDisks ', parameters('#ofAdditionalDisks'), ' -WorkloadType "', parameters('workloadType'), '" -SysAdminUsername "', parameters('adminUsername') , '" -SysAdminPassword "', parameters('adminPassword'), '"')]
